position.marginalia_text: domus. 12a. ♈. 27. domus. ♂. exaltatio. ☉. triplicitas. ☉ ♃. p[os]t: ♄. Terminus. ☿ Facies. ☉  cu[m] ☊ dexter. [ cu[m] ♄ - deleted] □. cu[m] ☾ dexter ut ♄ sinister. △ cu[m] ☉. ♂. ♀. ☿. ☋. sinister.

marginalia.translation: The twelfth house: Aries. 27. House: Mars. Exaltation: the sun. Triplicity: Mars [and] Jupiter after Saturn. Terminus: Mercury. Facies: the sun, a star with the north node on the right. [deleted: a star with Saturn]. Square with the moon on the right, as Saturn [is] on the left. A trine with the sun, Mars, Venus, Mercury, [and] the South node on the left.

position.marginalia_text: H.S. domus 12a. ♍. 0.7. domus. ☿ exaltatio. ☿. gaudiu[m] ☿. triplicitas. ♀. ☾. p[os]t. ♂. terminus. ☿. Facies. ☉. ibi. ☊. △ cu[m] ♃. sinister. △ cu[m] ☾ dexter. ☍ cu[m] ⨁.

marginalia.translation: H.S. The twelfth house: Virgo, 0.7. House: Mercury. Exaltation: Mercury. The joy of Mercury. Triplicity: Venus [and] the moon after Mars. Terminus: Mercury. Facies: the sun, where the north node [is]. A trine with Jupiter on the left. A trine with the moon on the right. An opposition with the earth.

position.marginalia_text: N. domus. 12a. ♒ 3.[.]0. dom[us] ♄. exaltatio. ♀. gaudiu[m]. ♄. triplicitas. ♃. ☿. p[os]t: ♄. terminus. ♄. Facies. ♀. . dext. cu[m] ☿. □. siniste[r]. cu[m] ☉. △. siniste[r] cu[m] ♀. ☍. cu[m] ♃. cor co[e]li 12:40: ♊.

marginalia.translation: N. The twelfth house: Aquarius, 3 [.] 0. House: Saturn. Exaltation: Venus. The joy of Saturn. Triplicity: Jupiter [and] Mercury after Saturn. Terminus: Saturn. Facies: Venus. A star on the right with Mercury. A square on the left with the sun. A trine on the left with Venus. An opposition with Jupiter. Midheaven: 12.40 Gemini.
